00038 /// class for accessing data in ipi.*.fasta files
00039 class IPIFASTADatabase
00040 {
00041     public:
00042 
00043     /// constructor reads in entire file
00044     IPIFASTADatabase(const std::string& filename);
00045     ~IPIFASTADatabase();
00046 
00047     /// structure for holding peptide info
00048     struct Record
00049     {
00050         int id;
00051         std::string sequence;
00052         Record(int _id=0) : id(_id) {}
00053     };
00054 
00055     /// access to the data in memory
00056     const std::vector<Record>& records() const; 
00057     
00058     /// typedef to simplify declaration of Record iterator
00059     typedef std::vector<Record>::const_iterator const_iterator;
00060 
00061     private:
00062     class Impl;
00063     std::auto_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00064 };
00065 
00066 
00067 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const IPIFASTADatabase::Record& record);
